SEARCH
Package medicalrecord

Class MedicalRecord

java.lang.Object
medicalrecord.MedicalRecord
public class MedicalRecord extends Object
This class represents a patient's medical record, including diagnoses, prescriptions, treatment plans, and prescription status. It provides functionality for managing and displaying patient medical data, as well as handling updates to diagnoses, prescriptions, and treatment plans.

This class is used to track the medical history of a patient, including details about the doctor who manages the case, the patient's condition, and prescribed treatments.

    Constructor that initializes a new MedicalRecord with all specified values, including the prescription status.

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicalRecord

      public MedicalRecord()
      Default constructor that initializes a new MedicalRecord object with empty values.

    • MedicalRecord

      public MedicalRecord(String medicalRID, String doctorID, String patientID, List<String> diagnoses, Map<String,Integer> prescriptions, List<String> treatmentPlans)
      Constructor that initializes a new MedicalRecord with specified values, without the prescription status.
      Parameters:
      medicalRID - The unique medical record ID.
      doctorID - The unique identifier for the doctor.
      patientID - The unique identifier for the patient.
      diagnoses - A list of diagnoses for the patient.
      prescriptions - A map of prescribed medications and their quantities.
      treatmentPlans - A list of treatment plans for the patient.

    • MedicalRecord

      public MedicalRecord(String medicalRID, String doctorID, String patientID, List<String> diagnoses, Map<String,Integer> prescriptions, List<String> treatmentPlans, PrescriptionStatus status)
      Constructor that initializes a new MedicalRecord with all specified values, including the prescription status.
      Parameters:
      medicalRID - The unique medical record ID.
      doctorID - The unique identifier for the doctor.
      patientID - The unique identifier for the patient.
      diagnoses - A list of diagnoses for the patient.
      prescriptions - A map of prescribed medications and their quantities.
      treatmentPlans - A list of treatment plans for the patient.
      status - The prescription status of the medical record.
